news.title: Two US firefighters shot dead in 'total ambush', police say
news.summary: The suspect has been found dead after the firefighters were killed with a high-powered weapon, authorities say.

news.title: Glastonbury's best bits: Capaldi's comeback, celebrity sightings and lots of spoons
news.summary: The UK's biggest festival is over for another year and here is what made it so memorable.

news.title: After five years in Belarus jail, opposition figure Tikhanovsky says he's not broken
news.summary: Sergei Tikhanovsky was kept isolated in bare, tiny cells and tells the BBC that Belarus must free other political prisoners.

news.title: Covid inquiry to look at impact on care services
news.summary: The Covid inquiry will examine the impact of the pandemic on care services, starting on Monday.

news.title: Jury retires in mushroom murder trial in Australia
news.summary: They will decide whether Erin Patterson murdered relatives with beef Wellingtons laced with toxic mushrooms.

news.title: Olivia Rodrigo leaves Glastonbury on a high
news.summary: The pop star delivered the weekend's most compelling, hit-packed headline slot as the festival ends.

news.title: In pictures: Sunday at Glastonbury Festival
news.summary: The final day saw a headline set from Olivia Rodrigo and performances including The Prodigy and Sir Rod Stewart.

news.title: 'Why did BBC not pull plug' and 'Meltdown Monday'
news.summary: The papers ask why the BBC aired "death to the IDF" Glastonbury chants and look ahead to 35C temperatures.

news.title: Williams ruled out of Lions tour as White called up
news.summary: Tomos Williams is ruled out of the rest of the British and Irish Lions tour of Australia with a hamstring injury.

news.title: What are main questions facing England before Euros?
news.summary: With six days to go until England kick off the defence of their European title, manager Sarina Wiegman has given a strong hint to her first-choice XI.
